chunks.text: In this video we're going to go over whitespace and escape characters.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Now the way this works is the browser will recognize one whitespace and that's all.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: So if you put two or three extra spaces here it wouldn't recognize that.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And you can see that right here right now.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: One whitespace is recognized by the browser.

chunks.text: But let's put in five whitespaces here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And then we'll go ahead and refresh our page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And you can see it didn't recognize those extra spaces.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And that's where escape characters come into play.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: So these are the escape characters right here for space.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And we need all these.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: The semicolon by the way is just to end the escape characters.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: So let's go ahead and copy and paste five of these into here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And now let's go ahead and refresh our web page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And there you can see now the browser recognizes those whitespaces.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Because we have these escape characters right here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Now we can use escape characters for symbols as well.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Suppose you want a trademark in your web page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Well we can go ahead and use these escape characters.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And let's just put this right here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And let's go ahead and refresh our page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And there you can see now we've got a trademark on our web page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And let's put a copyright notice too.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Let's use the escape characters for that.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: So we'll just put that right after our trademark.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And we'll refresh our page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And there you can see.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: So you can use escape characters for those as well.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Now some escape characters are needed.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Because you might confuse the browser.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And I'll show you that.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Let's go ahead and type in a greater sign right here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Now if we do that.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: The browser will think this is HTML code.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And it'll think that we're trying to close out this element.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: When really we want this in our content.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And so instead of typing that in.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: We can go ahead and use the escape character for the greater than sign.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And we'll just go ahead and copy and paste that in here.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And let's refresh our page.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And there you can see we've got our greater than sign now.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: And it's not actually being confused as HTML code.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: That's the key.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: The browser will not be confused.

chunks.title: HTML Tutorial for Beginners - 21 - Escape characters
chunks.text: Now there are many other escape characters.
